name: CustomPlayerWidgets
desc:
Defines custom UI components for the video player, allowing you to override
default widgets like loading indicators, error placeholders, and control bar elements.

name: CustomPlayerWidgets
desc:
Creates a new instance of CustomPlayerWidgets with optional overrides
for all supported customizations.

name: bottomControlsBar
desc: Widget used to replace the entire bottom control bar.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a new CustomPlayerWidgets instance with the specified fields overridden.

name: customDurationDisplay
desc: Widget used to replace the default current time / total duration display.

name: customRemainingTimeDisplay
desc: Widget used to replace the default remaining time indicator.

name: customSeekBar
desc: Widget used to replace the default seek bar / progress bar.

name: errorPlaceholder
desc: Widget displayed when an error occurs during playback initialization or runtime.

name: leadingBottomButtons
desc: Widgets displayed on the left (leading) side of the bottom control bar.

name: loadingWidget
desc: Widget displayed while the video player is initializing or buffering.

name: thumbnail
desc: Optional thumbnail image displayed before playback starts.

name: thumbnailFit
desc: Defines how the thumbnail is scaled inside its container.

name: trailingBottomButtons
desc: Widgets displayed on the right (trailing) side of the bottom control bar.

name: GlobalPlaybackControlSettings
desc: Settings for managing global playback behavior across multiple video players.

name: GlobalPlaybackControlSettings
desc: Creates a new GlobalPlaybackControlSettings instance.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a new GlobalPlaybackControlSettings instance with specified fields overridden.

name: synchronizeMuteAcrossPlayers
desc: Synchronizes the mute state across all video players controlled globally.

name: useGlobalPlaybackController
desc: Enables a global playback controller that enforces only one video playing at a time.

name: GlobalPlaybackController
desc:
Manages global video-player behavior to ensure a single active playback,
consistent audio settings, and appropriate wakelock handling.

name: GlobalPlaybackController
desc: Initializes the manager with a default state (volume=1, no active player).

name: requestPause
desc: Requests pausing of the currently active video.

name: requestPlay
desc: Requests playing controller, pausing any existing video first.

name: setCurrentVolume
desc: Updates the current volume setting in the shared state.

name: GlobalPlaybackControllerState
desc: Class for managing global video-players behaviours:

name: PlayerUIVisibilityOptions
desc:
Configuration options to control the visibility of various UI components
in the video player interface.

name: PlayerUIVisibilityOptions
desc: Creates a new instance of PlayerUIVisibilityOptions.

name: copyWith
desc:
Returns a copy of this PlayerUIVisibilityOptions but with
the given fields replaced by the new values.

name: showCurrentTime
desc: Whether to show the current playback time.

name: showDurationTime
desc: Whether to show the total video duration.

name: showErrorPlaceholder
desc: Whether to display an error placeholder widget if playback fails.

name: showFullScreenButton
desc: Whether to show the fullscreen toggle button.

name: showGradientBottomControl
desc: Whether to display a gradient overlay behind the bottom control bar.

name: showLiveIndicator
desc: Whether to show a live indicator when the video is a livestream.

name: showLoadingWidget
desc: Whether to show the loading widget during buffering.

name: showMuteUnMuteButton
desc: Whether to show the mute/unmute toggle button.

name: showRefreshButtonInErrorPlaceholder
desc: Whether to show a refresh button inside the error placeholder.

name: showRemainingTime
desc: Whether to show the remaining playback time.

name: showReplayButton
desc: Whether to show the replay button after the video ends.

name: showSeekBar
desc: Whether to display the seek bar.

name: showThumbnailAtStart
desc: Whether to show the thumbnail image before playback starts.

name: showVideoBottomControlsBar
desc: Whether to display the bottom control bar.

name: useSafeAreaForBottomControls
desc:
Whether to wrap the bottom control bar inside a SafeArea widget
to avoid overlaps with system UI elements like gesture bars or notches.

name: UniversalPlaybackController
desc: An abstract interface for controlling video playback across multiple source types.

name: buffered
desc: A list of buffered video ranges.

name: currentPosition
desc: The current playback position.

name: duration
desc: The total duration of the video.

name: hasError
desc: Whether an error occurred during initialization or playback.

name: hasStarted
desc: Whether playback has started at least once.

name: isBuffering
desc: Whether the video is currently buffering.

name: isFinished
desc: Whether playback has reached the end of the video.

name: isFullScreen
desc: Whether the player is currently in fullscreen mode.

name: isLive
desc: Whether the current video is a live stream.

name: isMuted
desc: Whether the video is currently muted.

name: isPlaying
desc: Whether playback is currently active.

name: isReady
desc: Whether the video is fully initialized and ready to play.

name: isSeeking
desc: Whether the player is actively seeking to a position.

name: mute
desc: Mutes the video.

name: pause
desc: Pauses the current playback.

name: play
desc: Starts or resumes playback.

name: replay
desc: Restarts the video from the beginning.

name: rotationCorrection
desc: Degrees of rotation to apply for video orientation correction.

name: seekTo
desc: Seeks the playback to the given position.

name: sharedPlayerNotifier
desc: A notifier containing the shared video player widget.

name: size
desc: The intrinsic size (width and height) of the video.

name: switchFullScreenMode
desc: Switches fullscreen mode for the video player.

name: toggleMute
desc: Toggles the mute state between muted and unmuted.

name: unMute
desc: Unmutes the video.

name: videoDataSource
desc: The raw data source of the video, such as a URL or asset path.

name: videoId
desc: A unique video identifier (e.g., YouTube/Vimeo video ID).

name: videoSourceType
desc: The type of video source (e.g., asset, network, YouTube, etc.).

name: videoUrl
desc: The resolved video URL, if available.

name: volume
desc: The current audio volume, from 0.0 (mute) to 1.0 (max).

name: wasPlayingBeforeSeek
desc: Whether playback was active prior to a seek operation.

name: UniversalVideoPlayer
desc: A universal and configurable video player widget supporting multiple video sources.

name: UniversalVideoPlayer
desc: Creates a new instance of UniversalVideoPlayer.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: callbacks
desc: Callback hooks for reacting to controller state changes and events.

name: options
desc: The playback configuration and source definition.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: wantKeepAlive
desc: Whether the current instance should be kept alive.

name: UniversalVideoPlayerTheme
desc:
An inherited widget that provides consistent theming for
UniversalVideoPlayer instances within its widget subtree.

name: data
desc: The theme data that defines the visual appearance of the video player.

name: of
desc:
Retrieves the nearest UniversalVideoPlayerThemeData from
the widget tree that encloses the given context.

name: updateShouldNotify
desc: Whether the framework should notify widgets that inherit from this widget.

name: wrap
desc: Return a copy of this inherited theme with the specified child.

name: UniversalVideoPlayerThemeData
desc:
A container for all theme-related data used by
UniversalVideoPlayer, divided into modular sub-themes.

name: colors
desc: Color scheme for all colors used in the video player.

name: copyWith
desc:
Returns a copy of this theme data, overriding only the
specified properties.

name: icons
desc: Icon data theme used for player controls and status indicators.

name: labels
desc: Label theme data, including default strings and messages.

name: overlays
desc: Theme data for overlays like background shading.

name: shapes
desc: Shape-related styling such as border radius.

name: VideoPlayerColorScheme
desc: Defines color properties for various UI elements of the video player.

name: active
desc: Color for active UI elements like the progress bar fill.

name: backgroundError
desc: Background color for the error screen.

name: backgroundThumbnail
desc: Background color of the video thumbnail display.

name: copyWith
desc:
Creates a copy of this color scheme overriding
the specified color values.

name: icon
desc: General icon color for controls (optional).

name: inactive
desc: Color for inactive or disabled UI elements.

name: liveIndicator
desc: Color of the live indicator badge (optional).

name: playPauseBackground
desc: Background color behind the play/pause icon.

name: playPauseIcon
desc: Color of the play/pause icon.

name: textDefault
desc: Default text color for labels and messages.

name: textError
desc: Text color for error messages.

name: thumb
desc: Color for the draggable thumb on the progress bar.

name: VideoPlayerIconTheme
desc: Defines icon data used for various player controls and status indicators.

name: copyWith
desc: Creates a copy of this icon theme with selective overrides.

name: error
desc: Icon shown on playback error.

name: exitFullScreen
desc: Icon for exiting fullscreen mode.

name: fullScreen
desc: Icon for entering fullscreen mode.

name: mute
desc: Icon representing volume on (mute).

name: playPause
desc: Animated icon used to toggle play/pause.

name: replay
desc: Icon used for replaying the video.

name: unMute
desc: Icon representing volume off (unmute).

name: VideoPlayerLabelTheme
desc: Defines default string labels used in the video player.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy of this label theme overriding only the provided fields.

name: errorMessage
desc: Default error message displayed on playback failure.

name: openExternalLabel
desc: Label for the action to open video in an external player.

name: refreshLabel
desc: Label for the action to refresh/reload the player.

name: VideoPlayerOverlayTheme
desc: Defines theming for overlays such as background shading behind the player.

name: alpha
desc: Alpha transparency value (0-255) applied to the background color.

name: backgroundColor
desc: Background color used for overlays.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy overriding the background color and/or alpha.

name: VideoPlayerShapeTheme
desc: Defines shape-related styling options such as border radius.

name: borderRadius
desc: Border radius applied to the video player UI.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy with an updated border radius.

name: VideoPlayerCallbacks
desc: A configuration class that provides callback hooks for responding to video player events.

name: VideoPlayerCallbacks
desc: Creates a new set of callback hooks for UniversalVideoPlayer and related widgets.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a new VideoPlayerCallbacks instance with specified callbacks overridden.

name: onCenterControlsVisibilityChanged
desc: Called when central controls (e.g., play/pause icon in the center) are shown or hidden.

name: onControllerCreated
desc: Called once when the internal UniversalPlaybackController is created and ready.

name: onFullScreenToggled
desc: Called when the player enters or exits fullscreen mode.

name: onMuteToggled
desc: Called when the mute state is toggled.

name: onOverlayControlsVisibilityChanged
desc: Called when overlay controls (e.g., seek bar, volume/mute, fullscreen) are shown or hidden.

name: onSeekEnd
desc: Called when the user ends a seek operation.

name: onSeekStart
desc: Called when the user starts seeking.

name: VideoPlayerConfiguration
desc: Configuration options for customizing the appearance and behavior of a video player.

name: VideoPlayerConfiguration
desc: Creates a new set of configuration options for a video player instance.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a new VideoPlayerConfiguration instance with specified fields overridden.

name: customPlayerWidgets
desc: Provides custom widget overrides like loading indicators, error placeholders, etc.

name: enableBackgroundOverlayClip
desc: Flag to enable or disable clipping of the background overlay using a rounded rectangle.

name: globalKeyInitializer
desc: A global key for the video player initializer state.

name: globalKeyPlayer
desc: A unique global key for the player widget, don't use it!

name: globalPlaybackControlSettings
desc: Controls global playback interactions like exclusive playback and mute sync.

name: liveLabel
desc: Label displayed for live streams.

name: playerTheme
desc: Custom theming options for the video player controls and appearance.

name: playerUIVisibilityOptions
desc: Flags that toggle visibility of player UI elements like seek bar, buttons, etc.

name: videoSourceConfiguration
desc: Defines how the video is loaded and played (URL, autoplay, volume, etc).

name: VideoSourceConfiguration
desc: Configuration object used to initialize video playback.

name: VideoSourceConfiguration.asset
desc: Factory constructor for asset or local file videos.

name: VideoSourceConfiguration.network
desc: Factory constructor for network videos.

name: VideoSourceConfiguration.vimeo
desc: Factory constructor for Vimeo videos.

name: VideoSourceConfiguration.youtube
desc: Factory constructor for YouTube videos.

name: allowSeeking
desc: Whether the user is allowed to seek the video.

name: autoMuteOnStart
desc: Whether playback should start muted.

name: autoPlay
desc: Whether playback should start automatically.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a new instance of VideoSourceConfiguration with updated common playback fields.

name: initialPosition
desc: The initial playback position.

name: initialVolume
desc: Initial volume level (range 0.0 to 1.0).

name: preferredQualities
desc: Preferred video quality levels in order of preference.

name: timeoutDuration
desc: Maximum wait time before considering playback failed.

name: videoDataSource
desc: The asset or file path (for asset or local file videos).

name: videoId
desc: The video ID (only for Vimeo videos).

name: videoSourceType
desc: Defines the source type, must match the appropriate data source field.

name: videoUrl
desc: The video URL (for YouTube or network-based videos).

name: VideoSourceType
desc: Defines the available video source types for the player.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.
